Suicide-93.op_claim: I believe that if sentenced to life in jail with no chance of getting out, you should be able to commit suicide instead CMV
Suicide-93.op_premise: If the idea of a life sentence is to keep you away from society forever wouldn't  suicide just do it faster?

reply_contents.content: This is actually a favourite debate on the UK & US circuit
elo_info: This is actually a favorite debate on the UK & US circuit

reply_contents.content: I don't know where I fall, so here's some things to think about on the opposite side
elo_info: I don't know where I fall, so here's some things to think about on the opposite side

reply_contents.content: How on earth can we trust that this decision will be made rationally
elo_info: How on earth can we trust that this decision will be made rationally

reply_contents.content: Seriously, obviously you can have psyche tests, checks, obs ect
elo_info: Seriously, obviously you can have psyche tests, checks, obs act

reply_contents.content: but you can be completely rational in thinking pattern but use no rational using data
elo_info: But you can be completely rational in thinking pattern but use no rational using data

elo_info.message: This sentence does not start with an uppercase letter

reply_contents.content: If you've been sentenced to life imprisonment you're not going to know what your life would be like in x amount of years
elo_info: If you've been sentenced to life imprisonment you're not going to know what your life would be like in x amount of years

elo_info.message: “If” at the beginning of a sentence requires a 2nd clause. Maybe a comma, question or exclamation mark is missing, or the sentence is incomplete and should be joined with the following sentence.

reply_contents.content: You can't know what death is, and you can't know how you'll grow and adapt in Prison
elo_info: You can't know what death is, and you can't know how you'll grow and adapt in Prison

reply_contents.content: It might be that you can actually carve some kind of pleasurable existence for yourself in prison, but you can't know
elo_info: It might be that you can actually carve some kind of pleasurable existence for yourself in prison, but you can't know

reply_contents.content: If the idea of a life sentence is to keep you away from society forever wouldn't suicide just do it faster
elo_info: If the idea of a life sentence is to keep you away from society forever wouldn't suicide just do it faster

elo_info.message: “If” at the beginning of a sentence requires a 2nd clause. Maybe a comma, question or exclamation mark is missing, or the sentence is incomplete and should be joined with the following sentence.

reply_contents.content: That's not neccessarily the idea, the idea is to do that in a humane way, to protect society whilst also facilitating a meaningful existence on the otherr side, otherwise the punishment is no more just than the crime
elo_info: That's not necessarily the idea, the idea is to do that in a humane way, to protect society whilst also facilitating a meaningful existence on the other side, otherwise the punishment is no more just than the crime

elo_info.message: Consider replacing "in a humane way" with adverb for "humane"; eg, "in a hasty manner" with "hastily".

reply_contents.content: I would say that facilitating, and actively encouraging suicide through condemnation doesn't do that
elo_info: I would say that facilitating, and actively encouraging suicide through condemnation doesn't do that

reply_contents.content: I think this makes it much, much tougher to deal out life sentences, seriously
elo_info: I think this makes it much, much tougher to deal out life sentences, seriously

reply_contents.content: When there's the chance that the prisoner may lose his life, a) there will be tons of appeals and infrastructure, which will cost a shit ton and it will clog up the courts, b) as a judge you know that your sentence might prompt the early curtailment of life and life potential
elo_info: When there's the chance that the prisoner may lose his life, a) there will be tons of appeals and infrastructure, which will cost a shit ton and it will clog up the courts, b) as a judge you know that your sentence might prompt the early curtailment of life and life potential

elo_info.message: Unpaired symbol: '(' seems to be missing
Unpaired symbol: '(' seems to be missing

reply_contents.content: How can their possibly be rationality here, on an individual level
elo_info: How can their possibly be rationality here, on an individual level

reply_contents.content: The people who get life sentences usually are seriously, seriously fucked up
elo_info: The people who get life sentences usually are seriously, seriously fucked up

reply_contents.content: Even the ones who are 'sane' like Brevik are clearly messed up - they've been failed somewhere down the line, it's our duty to comprehensively rehabilitate them
elo_info: Even the ones who is a are 'sane' like Break are clearly messed up - they've been failed somewhere down the line, it's our duty to comprehensively rehabilitate them

elo_info.message: A noun should not follow "who". Try changing to a verb or maybe to 'who is a are'.

reply_contents.content: Justice is (whether I agree with it or not) also about retribution
elo_info: Justice is (whether I agree with it or not) also about retribution

reply_contents.content: The cathartic benefits that sentencing has on families is lost when they're able to take control and save themselves of the suffering that their loved ones were denied
elo_info: The cathartic benefits that sentencing has on families is lost when they're able to take control and save themselves of the suffering that their loved ones were denied

reply_contents.content: I might, might agree with this if you let them do it after about 10 years of their sentence, but even then, I think it's very difficult to know that a rational choice has been made
elo_info: I might, might agree with this if you let them do it after about 10 years of their sentence, but even then, I think it's very difficult to know that a rational choice has been made

reply_contents.content: Good CMVEDIT: Just thought I'd add that 100% certain life imprisonments are something I strongly, strongly disagree with
elo_info: Good CMVEDIT: Just thought I'd add that 100% certain life imprisonments are something I strongly, strongly disagree with

reply_contents.content: EDIT: Thanks for all the Deltas

reply_contents.content: I'll try to find time to respond to everyone who offered rebuttal

reply_contents.content: Additional point:Allowing this option creates enormous possible incentive to victims (and the public at large) to work as hard as they can to make the convicted want to die

reply_contents.content: This is an absolute powder keg
